laboratory_examinations.findings: At diagnosis, severe polyhydramnios with an amniotic fluid index of 51 cm (19 weeks gestation) and 98 cm (at 19 weeks gestation).
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: The findings progressed from early-onset and severe polyhydramnios to preterm delivery.
Elevated renin (69, normal value 4-23 ng/ml/hr) and aldosterone (1735, normal value 25-213 ng/dl) levels noted.
Hypercalciuria normalized in parallel with resolution of renal salt and water losses.
